effect_entries.effect:
Used on a patch of soil
:   Plant's growth stages will each last 25% more time.  Dries soil out more slowly.
effect_entries.short_effect: Growing time of berries is increased, but the soil dries out slower.

flavor_text_entries.text:
きのみを　育てる　地方では
ふかふかのつちに　まいて　使う。

A fertilizer to be spread on soft soil
in regions where Berries are grown.

Viene usato nelle regioni in cui si coltivano
le bacche per concimare il terreno soffice.

Un fertilizante usado en suelo fértil donde crecen
las bayas.

In Regionen, wo man Beeren anbaut,
mengt man ihn unter weiche Lehmerde.
Un engrais à utiliser sur un sol meuble.

나무열매를 키우는 지방에서는
푹신푹신한 땅에 뿌려 쓴다.

きのみを　そだてる　ちほうでは
ふかふかのつちに　まいて　つかう。

A fertilizer to be spread on soft soil
in regions where Berries are grown.
A maniac will buy it for a high price.

A fertilizer to be spread on soft soil
in regions where Berries are grown.
A maniac will buy it for a high price.

Un engrais utilisé sur sol meuble.
Les amateurs en donnent un bon prix.

A fertilizer to be spread on soft soil.
It slows the growth of Berries and
causes the soil to dry slower.

A plant fertilizer spread on soft soil.
It slows the growth of Berries and
causes the soil to dry slower.

A plant fertilizer spread on soft soil.
It slows the growth of Berries and
causes the soil to dry slower.
